response: Welcome to the Ola Scooter, a revolution in electric design technology. This scooter boasts a stunning design in 12 colors, including a special Khaki Freedom edition. It features a large boot space, iconic headlamps, and a distinguishing personality. With advanced safety features like a side stand alert and companion app, it ensures a secure ride. The Ola Scooter also offers a unique Move OS with proximity unlock, advanced regenerative braking, and multiple user profiles. Experience superior performance with a top speed of 116 km/h and a range of 181 km. Enjoy the convenience of home charging and the speed of the Ola Hyper Charger. Welcome to the future of scooting with Ola.
